subject: Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Homosexuality
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Simon Thibodeau, 40, said his women’s tennis players at U.C.-Santa Barbara greeted his announcement mostly with shrugs, but for him it was freeing.
snippet: Simon Thibodeau, 40, said his women’s tennis players at U.C.-Santa Barbara greeted his announcement mostly with shrugs, but for him it was freeing.
